message.name: ERR_CANNOT_WITHDRAW_DISPOSED_PROGRAM_APPLICATION
message.locale: The program must have a status of Pending in order to be withdrawn.

message.name: ERR_PROGRAM_APP_HAS_OPEN_WITHDRAWAL_REQUEST
message.locale: This program application already has an open withdrawal request.

message.name: ERR_NO_OPEN_WITHDRAWAL_REQUEST_EXISTS
message.locale: No open withdrawal request exists for this program application

message.name: ERR_NOT_ASSOCIATED_TO_THAT_CASE
message.locale: The program application is not associated to the given Case.

message.name: ERR_PROGRAM_APPLICATION_ALREADY_DISPOSED
message.locale: This program application has already been disposed.

message.name: ERR_PROGRAM_APPLICATION_BEING_DISPOSED_ON_EXTERNAL_SYSTEM
message.locale: This program application is being disposed on the %1s system.

message.name: ERR_PROGRAM_APPLICATION_BEING_DISPOSED_IN_CURAM
message.locale: This program application is being disposed by Curam, not an external system.

message.name: ERR_MANDATORY_INTAKE_APPLICATION_ID
message.locale: An intake program application must be associated with an intake application.

message.name: ERR_MANDATORY_PROGRAM_TYPE_ID
message.locale: An intake program application must be associated with a program type.

message.name: ERR_NO_PROGRAMS_APPLIED_FOR
message.locale: The datastore does not contain details of any programs applied for by the citizen.

message.name: ERR_APPLICATION_CANNOT_BE_WITHDRAWN
message.locale: This program application cannot be withdrawn at this time. For more information please contact your local office.
